entry.title: New release for Enclosed: v1.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore(deps): update dependency wrangler to v3.72.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/52
  • chore(deps): update dependency @antfu/eslint-config to v2.27.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/48
  • chore(deps): update dependency tsx to v4.19.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/50
  • fix(deps): update dependency @hono/node-server to v1.12.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/51
  • chore(node): pin node version by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/54
  • fix(deps): update dependency solid-js to v1.8.22 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/55
  • chore(deps): update dependency @iconify-json/tabler to v1.1.121 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/56
  • fix(deps): update dependency @kobalte/core to v0.13.6 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/49

Full Changelog: https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/compare/v1.2.0...v1.2.1

entry.title: New release for Enclosed: v1.3.0
entry.content:
Breaking changes

The encryption and decription process has been improved and is not backward-compatible : so note encrypted with previous version will be viewable with this version

What's Changed

  • chore(deps): update dependency zx to v8.1.5 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/57
  • refactor(packages): mutualised encryption in a lib package by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/63
  • fix(docker): proper rights for data directory by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/64

Full Changelog: https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/compare/v1.2.1...v1.3.0

entry.title: New release for Enclosed: v1.3.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(deps): update dependency hono to v4.5.10 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/62
  • chore(deps): update dependency wrangler to v3.73.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/60
  • feat(cli): added enclosed cli by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/66
  • refactor(server, cors): simplified cors configuration by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/67
  • chore(ci): added workflow for cli package by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/68
  • feat(server): added timeout middleware by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/69
  • feat(cli): added view command by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/71
  • chore(deps): update dependency @iconify-json/tabler to v1.2.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/70
  • chore(deps): update dependency @total-typescript/ts-reset to v0.6.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/73
  • chore(repo): added issue templates by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/78
  • fix(deps): update dependency hono to v4.5.11 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/82
  • fix(deps): update dependency pino to v9.4.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/81
  • fix(deps): update dependency @inquirer/prompts to v5.4.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/79
  • fix(deps): update dependency picocolors to v1.1.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/80
  • chore(deps): update dependency wrangler to v3.74.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/84
  • chore(deps): update dependency vite to v5.4.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/83

Full Changelog: https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/compare/v1.3.1...v1.3.2

entry.title: New release for Enclosed: v1.4.0
entry.content:
File sharing is out! :tada:

What's Changed

  • The env variable NOTES_MAX_ENCRYPTED_CONTENT_LENGTH has been renamed NOTES_MAX_ENCRYPTED_PAYLOAD_LENGTH
  • Error 413 when note too big now has code note.payload_too_large instead of note.content_too_large
  • Database format has changed (content field become payload)

Commits details : * chore(deps): update dependency @cloudflare/workers-types to v4.20240903.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/85 * fix(deps): update dependency unstorage to update dependency wrangler to v3.75.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/91 * fix(deps): update dependency @inquirer/prompts to v5.5.0 by @renovate in
